doc:
Alain Chabat https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alain_Chabat 0 Alain Chabat (born 24 November 1958) is a French actor, director, screenwriter and television presenter. He was originally known for his work in the comedy group Les Nuls, including as the co-writer and lead actor of La Cité de la peur (1994). He has since then become a notable filmmaker of his own, typically both writing and starring in the movies he directed, which include cult comedy films such as Asterix Obelix: Mission Cleopatra, RRRrrrr!!! and HOUBA! On the Trail of the Marsupilami. He also appeared in French Twist, The Taste of Others, The Science of Sleep, Happily Ever After and the television series Kaamelott. Additionally, he voiced the character of Shrek in the French dubbing of the Shrek franchise. Alain_Chabat ( born 24_November_1958 ) is a_French_actor , director , screenwriter_and_television_presenter . He was_originally_known for his_work in the_comedy_group_Les_Nuls , including as the_co-writer and lead actor of La_Cité_de_la peur ( 1994_) . On the_Trail of the_Marsupilami . He also appeared in French_Twist , The_Taste of Others , The_Science of Sleep , Happily_Ever After and the_television_series_Kaamelott . Additionally , he voiced the_character of Shrek in the_French_dubbing of the_Shrek_franchise .
